verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הָל֛וֹךְ <WH1980> Go וְקָנִ֥יתָ <WH7069> and get בַקְבֻּ֖ק <WH1228> bottle יוֹצֵ֣ר <WH3335> a potter's חָ֑רֶשׂ <WH2789> earthen וּמִזִּקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> and [take] of the ancients הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people וּמִזִּקְנֵ֖י <WH2205> and of the ancients הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <WH3548> of the priests

וְיָצָ֙אתָ֙ <WH3318> And go forth אֶל־ <WH413> to גֵּ֣יא <WH1516> unto the valley בֶן־ <WH1121> of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <WH2011> of Hinnom אֲשֶׁ֕ר <WH834> which פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> which [is] by the entry שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate [הַחֲרָסוּת כ] (הַֽחַרְסִ֑ית <WH2777> east ק) וְקָרָ֣אתָ <WH7121> and proclaim שָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> there the words אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> that I shall tell אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> and to

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> And say שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> ye the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> O kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> and inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַר֩ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am about מֵבִ֤יא <WH935> Behold I will bring רָעָה֙ <WH7451> evil עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> upon this place הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which כָּל־ <WH3605> of everyone שֹׁמְעָ֖הּ <WH8085> the which whosoever heareth תִּצַּ֥לְנָה <WH6750> shall tingle אָזְנָֽיו׃ <WH241> his ears

יַ֣עַן ׀ <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they עֲזָבֻ֗נִי <WH5800> Because they have forsaken וַֽיְנַכְּר֞וּ <WH5234> me and have estranged אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּק֤וֹם <WH4725> this place הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this וַיְקַטְּרוּ־ <WH6999> and have burned incense בוֹ֙ לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> in it unto other אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> that לֹֽא־ <WH3808> neither יְדָע֛וּם <WH3045> have known הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> like וַאֲבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1> whom neither they nor their fathers וּמַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> nor the kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וּמָֽלְא֛וּ <WH4390> and have filled אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> this place הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this דַּ֥ם <WH1818> with the blood נְקִיִּֽם׃ <WH5355> of innocents

וּבָנ֞וּ <WH1129> They have built אֶת־ <WH853> בָּמ֣וֹת <WH1116> also the high places הַבַּ֗עַל <WH1168> of Baal לִשְׂרֹ֧ף <WH8313> to burn אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶ֛ם <WH1121> their sons בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> with fire עֹל֣וֹת <WH5930> [for] burnt offerings לַבָּ֑עַל <WH1168> unto Baal אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> never צִוִּ֙יתִי֙ <WH6680> which I commanded וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> of nor דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> not nor spake וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> of nor עָלְתָ֖ה <WH5927> [it] neither came עַל־ <WH5921> and לִבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> [it] into my mind פ

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> therefore הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> behold יָמִ֤ים <WH3117> Therefore behold the days בָּאִים֙ <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלֹא־ <WH3808> will no יִקָּרֵא֩ <WH7121> shall no more be called לַמָּק֨וֹם <WH4725> that this place הַזֶּ֥ה <WH2088> this ע֛וֹד <WH5750> longer הַתֹּ֖פֶת <WH8612> Tophet וְגֵ֣יא <WH1516> nor The valley בֶן־ <WH1121> of the son הִנֹּ֑ם <WH2011> of Hinnom כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo גֵּ֥יא <WH1516> but The valley הַהֲרֵגָֽה׃ <WH2028> of slaughter

וּ֠בַקֹּתִי <WH1238> And I will make void אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצַ֨ת <WH6098> the counsel יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> and Jerusalem בַּמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְהִפַּלְתִּ֤ים <WH5307> and I will cause them to fall בַּחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> by the sword לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH341> their enemies וּבְיַ֖ד <WH3027> and by the hands מְבַקְשֵׁ֣י <WH1245> of them that seek נַפְשָׁ֑ם <WH5315> their lives וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> will I give אֶת־ <WH853> נִבְלָתָם֙ <WH5038> and their carcases לְמַֽאֲכָ֔ל <WH3978> to be meat לְע֥וֹף <WH5775> for the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of the heaven וּלְבֶהֱמַ֥ת <WH929> and for the beasts הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וְשַׂמְתִּי֙ <WH7760> And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise לְשַׁמָּ֖ה <WH8047> desolate וְלִשְׁרֵקָ֑ה <WH8322> and an hissing כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> everyone עֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> every one that passeth עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> because יִשֹּׁ֥ם <WH8074> thereby shall be astonished וְיִשְׁרֹ֖ק <WH8319> and hiss עַל־ <WH5921> because כָּל־ <WH3605> of all מַכֹּתֶֽהָ׃ <WH4347> because of all the plagues

וְהַֽאֲכַלְתִּ֞ים <WH398> And I will cause them to eat אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשַׂ֣ר <WH1320> the flesh בְּנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1121> of their sons וְאֵת֙ <WH853> בְּשַׂ֣ר <WH1320> and the flesh בְּנֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1323> of their daughters וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one בְּשַׂר־ <WH1320> the flesh רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> of his friend יֹאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> and they shall eat בְּמָצוֹר֙ <WH4692> in the siege וּבְמָצ֔וֹק <WH4689> and straitness אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יָצִ֧יקוּ <WH6693> shall straiten לָהֶ֛ם אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <WH341> wherewith their enemies וּמְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <WH1245> and they that seek נַפְשָֽׁם׃ <WH5315> their lives
וְשָׁבַרְתָּ֖ <WH7665> Then shalt thou break הַבַּקְבֻּ֑ק <WH1228> the bottle לְעֵינֵי֙ <WH5869> in the sight הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> of the men הַהֹלְכִ֖ים <WH1980> that go אוֹתָֽךְ׃ <WH854> for

וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <WH559> And shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> to כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts כָּ֣כָה <WH3602> Even so אֶשְׁבֹּ֞ר <WH7665> will I break אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> and this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which יִשְׁבֹּר֙ <WH7665> as [one] breaketh אֶת־ <WH853> כְּלִ֣י <WH3627> vessel הַיּוֹצֵ֔ר <WH3335> a potter's אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> that cannot לְהֵרָפֵ֖ה <WH7495> be made whole again ע֑וֹד <WH5750> again וּבְתֹ֣פֶת <WH8612> [them] in Tophet יִקְבְּר֔וּ <WH6912> and they shall bury מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> there מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> till [there be] no place לִקְבּֽוֹר׃ <WH6912> to bury

כֵּֽן־ <WH3651> This אֶעֱשֶׂ֞ה <WH6213> Thus will I do לַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> unto this place הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> this נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וּלְיֽוֹשְׁבָ֑יו <WH3427> and to the inhabitants וְלָתֵ֛ת <WH5414> thereof and [even] make אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> this city הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> like כְּתֹֽפֶת׃ <WH8612> as Tophet

וְהָי֞וּ <WH1961> become בָּתֵּ֣י <WH1004> And the houses יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וּבָתֵּי֙ <WH1004> and the houses מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah כִּמְק֥וֹם <WH4725> as the place הַתֹּ֖פֶת <WH8612> of Tophet הַטְּמֵאִ֑ים <WH2931> shall be defiled לְכֹ֣ל <WH3605> of all הַבָּתִּ֗ים <WH1004> because of all the houses אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whose קִטְּר֜וּ <WH6999> they have burned incense עַל־ <WH5921> and גַּגֹּֽתֵיהֶם֙ <WH1406> upon whose roofs לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> to all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> unto all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְהַסֵּ֥ךְ <WH5258> and have poured out נְסָכִ֖ים <WH5262> drink offerings לֵאלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <WH312> unto other פ

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> Then came יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> Jeremiah מֵֽהַתֹּ֔פֶת <WH8612> from Tophet אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after שְׁלָח֧וֹ <WH7971> had sent יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> whither the LORD שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it לְהִנָּבֵ֑א <WH5012> him to prophesy וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> and he stood בַּחֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> in the court בֵּית־ <WH1004> house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> to all the people ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold [מֵבִי כ] (מֵבִ֜יא <WH935> abide ק) אֶל־ <WH413> about הָעִ֤יר <WH5892> upon this city הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise וְעַל־ <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֶ֔יהָ <WH5892> and upon all her towns אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the entire הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> all the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> that I have pronounced עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> against כִּ֤י <WH3588> because הִקְשׁוּ֙ <WH7185> against it because they have hardened אֶת־ <WH853> עָרְפָּ֔ם <WH6203> their necks לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> not שְׁמ֥וֹעַ <WH8085> that they might not hear אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרָֽי׃ <WH1697> my words
